attributes.action: Parliament be allowed a FREE VOTE on rejoining the Single Market & Customs Union
attributes.additional_details:
Public opinion is now overwhelmingly in favour of rejoining the Single Market & the Customs Union. It is now an economic imperative that we do, but the leadership of this government refuses to countenance it and to give its reasons.
In the circumstances, and on such an important issue, Parliament should be allowed the freedom express its opinion in FREE VOTE.
attributes.background: The government should allow a FREE VOTE on rejoining the Single Market and the Customs Union.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701946
